Item.Name: Selection
Item.Caption: Selection
Item.Description: The demo shows how to customize appearance and behavior of selected text within edit control's content.
Item.Note: Editor.NET supports a concept of text selection and a wide range of operations on it, including copy/pasting operations, drag-n-drop, indenting/unindenting, lowercasing/uppercasing, etc. All the selection related aspects are controlled via the Selection property.
